verbose_text: Although delivery of the CRFR2 antagonist K41498 (9 pmol/0.3 muL per side) into the VTA prior to social defeat had no significant effect, stress enhanced cocaine conditioning was significantly suppressed by the alpha1AR antagonist prazosin (9 pmol/0.3 muL per side) and abolished by co-injection of K41498 and prazosin (XREF_FIG).
evidence: cocaine conditioning was significantly suppressed by the alpha1AR antagonist prazosin (9 pmol/0.3 muL per side) and abolished by co-injection of K41498 and prazosin
